overview: A documentary short about Charley Patton included in the box set "The Definitive Charley Patton - 75th Anniversary Edition". The film contains interviews with musicians, musicologists, blues scholars and Delta historians and contains brand new footage of Dockeryâ€™s, the legendary plantation where Patton was raised and where many people believe the Delta Blues truly blossomed as an art form.
tagline: From "The Definitive Charley Patton - 75th Anniversary Edition" Box Set
title: Talkin' Charley Patton
